description: A creamy soup made with clams, potatoes, onions, and bacon.
A thick, savory pizza with a deep crust, topped with cheese, sauce, and various toppings.
Crispy and juicy chicken, often served with mashed potatoes and gravy, collard greens, and cornbread.
Tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa, often served with rice and beans.
Fresh salmon grilled or baked with a variety of seasonings, often served with rice or vegetables.
